typedef long long ll;

inline int getint()
{
    int c;
    while(c=getchar(),(c<'0'||c>'9')&&(c!='-')&&(c!=EOF));
    if(c==EOF)
    {
        return -1;
    }
    bool flag=(c=='-');
    if(flag)
    {
        c=getchar();
    }
    int x=0;
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x = (x<<3)+x+x+c-'0';
        c=getchar();
    }
    return flag?-x:x;
}

inline void output(int x)
{
    if(x<0)
    {
        putchar('-');
        x=-x;
    }
    int len=0,buf[20];
    while(x)
    {
        buf[len++]=x%10;
        x/=10;
    }
    if(!len)
    {
        buf[len++]=0;
    }
    while(len--)
    {
        putchar(buf[len]+'0');
    }
    putchar('\n');
}
